intro: Crafting digital experiences with modern technologies
crafting: Crafting digital experiences with modern technologies

isitcom: Institut Supérieur d'Informatique et de Technologie de Communication de Hammam Sousse.(ISITCOM)

projects_info: Some of my recent work that i'm proud of
zipit_description: A modern file zipper tool with intuitive interface and lightning-fast compression algorithms for seamless file management.
restaurant_description: Complete restaurant management system featuring Java Swing frontend with robust SQL database backend for inventory and order management.
finora_description: Mobile finance tracker built with React Native and Expo, featuring expense tracking, budget management, and financial insights.
portfolio_description: My personal portfolio website showcasing my projects, skills, and experience with a modern design and smooth animations.
shooter_description: A fast-paced 2D shooter game built with Unity.
lets_talk_info: Feel free to reach out or ask chatbot about me!
lynkai_description: A web application with JWT authentication built with Angular and Spring Boot. Features a RAG model that uses document chunks as context, enabling intelligent document Q&A and AI-powered summary generation for uploaded files.
storyboard_description: An AI-powered storyboard generator using a custom-trained VGG-inspired CNN (67% accuracy) for shot classification and SDXL diffusion pipeline. Generates professional 1024×1024 storyboard images from scripts with camera angle detection and automated annotations.
nexusdown_description: A robust download manager featuring infinite retry mechanism on errors and concurrent parallel downloads for maximum speed. Built with Python for reliable and efficient file downloading.
securefile_description: A secure cloud storage service inspired by Google Drive, built with Spring Boot. Features JWT authentication, encrypted file storage, and seamless upload/download functionality.
ocr_description: An intelligent document scanner using Tesseract OCR to extract text from images and automatically populate forms. Enhanced with Gemini API for advanced text processing and understanding.
flamebot_description: A conversational AI chatbot powered by Google's Gemini API. Uses natural language processing and machine learning algorithms to engage in natural-sounding conversations with users.
finora_description: A comprehensive financial management mobile application built with React Native and Expo, featuring expense tracking, budgeting tools, and financial insights.
portfolio_description: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with Next.js, featuring smooth animations and a beautiful dark theme.
restaurant_description: A comprehensive restaurant management system with inventory tracking, order management, and reporting features.
shooter_description: An action-packed 2D shooting game built with Unity, featuring multiple levels and engaging gameplay mechanics.
zipit_description: A simple and easy-to-use GUI application for compressing folders into ZIP files and extracting ZIP archives.
